text: Nakhoi nasagi mahousagi asonba adugi maramna numitkhudinggi sijinnaba achamba londa eina nganglibani. Nakhoina sengdaba amasung phattaba thabaksingda sijinnanaba phattabagi minai oina nakhoi nasa pumnamak katlammi adubu houjikti achumba chatpa thabaksinggidamak sijinnanaba nakhoi nasa pumnamakpu katlu.
